revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Pine64 |model=SOPine |revision=-A64 (Rev C) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=29 |est_release_date=02/2016 |type=SoM |pwr_v=5 |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=A64 |cpu1_cspeed=1.1 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128JVSQ |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Artmem |ram1_model=ATL3A1632-H12A |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |addl_chips=PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP803;;1;,,, 1.2MHz 2A Step Up Converter;Aerosemi;MT3608;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot }} {{TagLine|SOPine-A64 Compute Module}} :[https://www.pine64.org/sopine/ Product page]
"Designed in Silicon Valley, California" and "Built in Silicon Delta, China" :are silkscreened on the board bottom. "SOPine-A64 Rev C" and "2017-02-07" are silkscreened on board top.
===Links=== *[https://wiki.pine64.org/wiki/SOPINE ''SOPINE'' on '''PINE64 Wiki'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Pine64 ''Pine64'' on '''SUNXI Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/01/17/pine64-introduces-sopine-a64-allwinner-a64-som-and-sopine-model-a-baseboard/ ''PINE64 Introduces SOPINE A64 Allwinner A64 SoM'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/open-spec-29-com-shrinks-pine-a64-to-sodimm-dimensions-2/ ''Open spec, $29 COM shrinks Pine A64 to SODIMM dimensions'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] A64 @1.152GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' (H.265/HEVC 4K) *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR3) SDRAM *SoM Connector: 204-pin SO-DIMM slot *Ports: 2x USB 2.0, 1x GbE (RGMII) *Power Source: 5V via connectors
==Images== <gallery> File:Pine64 SOPine-A64 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Pine64 SOPine-A64 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
